name: Skillet Seafood Bisque
instructions: Melt butter in 10" skillet and add mushrooms, VEGETABLE and garlic; cook until tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in flour until smooth. Gradually stir in chicken broth; heat to boiling, stirring constantly.
Add SEAFOOD and reduce heat to low. Cover; simmer about 5 minutes or until seafood is done. Stir in LIQUID and parsley and heat through. Ladle into bowls and top with GARNISH.
